org.unbunt.ella.engine.context
Interface SQLResultProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
Context, Engine
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultContext, EllaCPSEngine
public interface SQLResultProvider

Represents an observable for SQL results as in the well known observer pattern.

See Also:
SQLResultListener

Method Summary
 void addSQLResultListener(SQLResultListener listener)
          Registers an SQL result listener to be notified about incoming SQL results.
 void notifyResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
          Tells this observable to notify registered observers about the given SQL result set.
 void notifyUpdateCount(int updateCount)
          Tells this observable to notify registered observers about the given SQL update count.
 void removeSQLResultListener(SQLResultListener listener)
          Unregisters an SQL result listener so that it will no longer be notified about incoming SQL results.
 

Method Detail

notifyResultSet

void notifyResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
Tells this observable to notify registered observers about the given SQL result set.

Parameters:
resultSet - the SQL result set to notify observers about.

notifyUpdateCount

void notifyUpdateCount(int updateCount)
Tells this observable to notify registered observers about the given SQL update count.

Parameters:
updateCount - the SQL update count to notify observers about.

addSQLResultListener

void addSQLResultListener(SQLResultListener listener)
Registers an SQL result listener to be notified about incoming SQL results. If this listener is already registered, the request is ignored.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be registered.

removeSQLResultListener

void removeSQLResultListener(SQLResultListener listener)
Unregisters an SQL result listener so that it will no longer be notified about incoming SQL results. If there is no such listener is registered, the request is ignored.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be unregistered.
